description: Technical visionary and founder of Iymra Labs. With a deep background in frontend engineering and decentralized technologies, he leads the company’s product development and technical strategy. His work focuses on building scalable, user-friendly digital experiences that bridge Web2 and Web3, shaping Iymra into a next-generation superapp ecosystem.
name: AtheX Web3

description: oversees all aspects of business operations at Iymra Labs, from strategic planning and partnerships to team coordination and growth execution. With a sharp eye for structure and long-term scale, he ensures the company stays aligned with its mission while expanding across markets and verticals.
name: Zyphor

description: Growing community with dedication and clarity. As an Intern and Community Moderator, he helps manage conversations, assists users, and ensures a friendly, well-informed environment across our platforms. His enthusiasm and consistency make him a valuable early contributor to Iymra’s mission.
name: Apex Light
